mapper.sql: a.roomid AS "roomid", a.source AS "source", a.wyid AS "wyid", a.htid AS "htid", a.khid AS "khid", a.wyno AS "wyno", a.wyname AS "wyname", a.lyid AS "lyid", a.lyno AS "lyno", a.lyname AS "lyname", a.roomno AS "roomno", a.terminationstatus AS "terminationstatus", a.terminationdate AS "terminationdate", a.memberid AS "memberid", a.createtime AS "createtime", a.updatetime AS "updatetime", a.group_id AS "groupId"
mapper.select:
SELECT
,b.member_name AS "membername" FROM wy_room a, wy_member b
a.memberid = b.member_id
AND a.roomno like concat('%',#{roomno},'%')
AND a.lyname like concat('%',#{lyname},'%')
AND a.wyname like concat('%',#{wyname},'%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO wy_room( roomid, source, wyid, htid, khid, wyno, wyname, lyid, lyno, lyname, roomno, terminationstatus, terminationdate, memberid, createtime, updatetime ) VALUES ( #{roomid}, #{source}, #{wyid}, #{htid}, #{khid}, #{wyno}, #{wyname}, #{lyid}, #{lyno}, #{lyname}, #{roomno}, #{terminationstatus}, #{terminationdate}, #{memberid}, #{createtime}, #{updatetime} )
mapper.update: UPDATE wy_room SET roomid = #{roomid}, source = #{source}, wyid = #{wyid}, htid = #{htid}, khid = #{khid}, wyno = #{wyno}, wyname = #{wyname}, lyid = #{lyid}, lyno = #{lyno}, lyname = #{lyname}, roomno = #{roomno}, terminationstatus = #{terminationstatus}, terminationdate = #{terminationdate}, memberid = #{memberid}, createtime = #{createtime}, updatetime = #{updatetime} WHERE roomid = #{roomid}
mapper.select:
SELECT DISTINCT a.source, a.WYID, a.WYName FROM wy_room a
WHERE a.source = #{source} AND a.group_id = #{groupId}
